justification: Vendor 3 explicitly details modular development in Cloud 3 for rapid composition and recomposition of Digital Twin applications using pre-built components and templates (‘modular development capabilities,’ ‘pre-built components, templates, and service blocks’). Interfaces support DTDL, OpenAPI, and low-code tools, with recognized standards (JSON-LD, ISO/IEC 27001). The ability section directly states use of packaged, reusable capabilities for use-case-specific outcomes and supporting citizen development. All elements are directly addressed with clear, specific evidence.
